clean_up_desc: Immediately deletes all books marked as sold or removed. Usually those books will be automatically deleted after a few days.
could_not_create_the_condition_try_again: Could not create the condition. Try again later.
could_not_delete_the_condition_try_again: Could not delete the condition. Try again later.
could_not_update_the_condition_try_again: Could not update the condition. Try again later.
conditions_desc: All books can have a condition assigned. Only admins are allowed to create new conditions. Removing a condition, results in books without a condition.
branch_update_error: Could not update the branch. Try again later.
cache_advise: If something went wrong and you did an update just before, hit <kbd>Cmd</kbd> + <kbd>F5</kbd>. The app will be loaded bypassing the cache.
savedsearches_create_error: Could not save the search. Try again later.
savedsearches_remove_error: Could not remove the search. Try again later.
savedsearches_desc: Searches can be saved by admins and loaded by all users of the branch.
remove_tag_error: Could not remove the tag. Try again later.
deprecated: Deprecated! This feature will be removed soon!
drop_the_file_in_this_area_or_click_here: Drop the file in this area or click here.
coverUploadError: Upload failed! Please check file and file size.
filtersAdvice: If you are filtering for more then one branch, please do not use genres. It could lead into weird results.
doNotEditReservedBooks: Please do not edit a reserved book unless you know what you are doing.
articlesInCart: There is {counter} article in the cart. Please complete the reservation. | There are {counter} articles in the cart. Please complete the reservation.
branchNameHelp: The name is shown in the filters, the public search and on other places.
branchStepsHelp: The price of a book can be increased and decreased in fixed steps.
branchOrderingHelp: How customers can purchase the book. This text is shown in the public search for every book.
branchOrderByHelp: How to sort genres throughout the app.
reservationDesc:
You are searching for books and can add them to the shopping cart. At the reservation page you can add all books from the shopping cart to a reservation. You can also save a collection date and notes, although all details are optional. If you just want to set a collection date, go directly to the reservation page and set a date.

The records are tied to a branch and can only be viewed by that branch. Only admins are allowed to delete a reservation - all books must be marked as sold or removed.

A book can be removed from the reservation by opening the book for editing and removing the tick in front of "Reserved".
branchPublicHelp: Whether you want to appear in the public search or not.
inventoryDesc: After creating a new inventory you will see a new button in the search. In Inventory Mode you can mark books as found and not found. Closing an inventory means marking all not found books as removed and reset inventory state on all books.
formatsDesc: Everyone can see formats, but only admins can create new ones or delete existing formats.
enter_bookmark_and_hit_enter: Enter new bookmark and hit enter.
bookmarksDesc: Bookmarks can be created by everyone and are bound to a branch.
pricelistDesc: Define a price and depending on properties you can increase or decrease the price.
priceCalcReleaseYearHelp: Use keypairs like YEAR:PRICE e.g. 2021:-1. One entry per line.
priceCalcConditionHelp: Use keypairs like CONDITION_ID:PRICE e.g. 1:2. One entry per line.
